battle-backbone gives you a structure for large scale business applications that perform lots of tasks in the user's browser. It helps you with localization, gives you a way to achieve lazy loading your code and your assets and enables you to write loose coupled applications that stay maintainable while growing.

It also provides solutions for a couple of dont's in Backbone and Marionette and helps you minimize memory leaks.

battle-backbone

In the battle-backbone section you find information about the core that boots up the application, Services used to provide general funtionality throughout your application and Modules that contain your application logic and views.

Components

This section explains the different components provided out of the box, how they work and how they can be extended. That includes the routing system, Multi language support and lazy loading of static assets or JavaScript code.

Architecture

battle-backbone gives you a structure for sophisticated large scale applications that can be extended and scaled easily. It provides you with a small Core, a flexible Module system, reusable Components and smaller Services connected using a powerful Event bus that makes communcation between services and modules easy.

These components follow the Separation of Concerns and Single Responsibility patterns and help you keep your application maintainable.

Get started

You need Node (and npm) and Yeoman for that.

Install battle-backbone with npm

npm install -g generator-battle-backbone

You might need sudo for that

Scaffold your application using Yeoman

yo battle-backbone

All dependencies will be installed automatically using npm

Start coding
